title: Bug 121323: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
OB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog does not retain the filter information when the user leaves the dialog. The data stored in the filterInfo HashMap is lost.
EB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog should persist the filter information when the user leaves the dialog. The data stored in the filterInfo HashMap should be retained.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open the XML Edit Data Set dialog. 2. Enter an XPath expression for the column mapping that includes a selection part (e.g., section[@id='left']). 3. Close the dialog. 4. Reopen the XML Edit Data Set dialog and observe that the filter information is not retained.
